content.rendered:
Samadara Ultimate Age-Defying Crème is Sodashi’s most intensive skin transforming treatment.

Intensely hydrating and deeply nourishing, the Samadara Crème visibly firms, lifts and plumps the skin. Discolouration is diminished and fine lines and wrinkles smoothed.

Antioxidant-rich organic plant oils rosehip, everlasting, centella and rose work to dramatically regenerate your skin and defend it from future damage.

Rose quartz crystal water gives the Crème a calming and stabilising energy, to restore a youthful appearance and texture. Skin regains clarity and vitality.

This product is made lovingly by hand in Western Australia.

The Crème comes with two Rose Quartz Crystal medallions to massage the treatment into the skin for maximum benefit.

excerpt.rendered: Sodashi’s most age-defying formulation to transform and reawaken the skin. Hand made in Western Australia from the purest botanical extracts.
